LanguageData.VRE_ExtremeMeditation.label: extreme meditation
LanguageData.VRE_ExtremeMeditation.description: Carriers of this gene are capable of having much more impactful meditation sessions. They will regenerate psyfocus significantly quicker.
LanguageData.VRE_SwiftMeditation.label: swift meditation
LanguageData.VRE_SwiftMeditation.description: Carriers of this gene are capable of having a faster meditation sessions. They will regenerate psyfocus slightly faster than usual.
LanguageData.VRE_SlowMeditation.label: slow meditation
LanguageData.VRE_SlowMeditation.description: Carriers of this gene are finding it difficult to focus during meditation sessions. They will regenerate psyfocus significantly slower than usual.
LanguageData.VRE_WeakEntropyCapacity.label: weak entropy capacity
LanguageData.VRE_WeakEntropyCapacity.description: Carriers of this gene have a much lower capacity to withstand the chaotic psychic energy accumulated via psychic powers they use.
LanguageData.VRE_HighEntropyCapacity.label: high entropy capacity
LanguageData.VRE_HighEntropyCapacity.description: Carriers of this gene have a higher capacity to withstand the chaotic psychic energy accumulated via psychic powers they use.
LanguageData.VRE_ExtremeEntropyCapacity.label: extreme entropy capacity
LanguageData.VRE_ExtremeEntropyCapacity.description: Carriers of this gene have a much higher capacity to withstand the chaotic psychic energy accumulated via psychic powers they use.
